resources.string: Fresh stories and bold ideas to help you live curiously

Welcome to Weaver!

We are thrilled to have you here and hope you have a great time with us. With WEAVER, you can select the topics you are interested in from categories and receive news from thousands of interesting newspapers, magazines and blogs all in one place. With WEAVER, you can easily switch to topics of choice and read news. Over 60 countries with thousands of sources in one app are waiting for you.

CONTACT

We always appreciate your feedback so we can improve with your help. Please send your feedback and suggestions by e-mail to: cnoceania@gmail.com
